text: aur baz ahale dehaath mein aise bhi hai jo Allah tala par aur qayamath ke din par iman rakhte hai aur jo kuch qarch karte hai us ko indallah qurb hasil hone ka zariya aur rasool ki dua ka zariya banate hai,yad rakho ke un ka ye qarch karna beshak un ke liye maujibe qurbath hai,un ko Allah tala zaror apni rehmath mein dakhil karega,Allah tala badi maghfirath wala badi rehmath wala hai
